Class StreamGobbler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
gw.pl.util.StreamGobbler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StreamGobbler.StringBufferStreamGobbler, StreamGobbler.StringBuilderStreamGobbler
public class StreamGobbler extends Thread

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    StreamGobbler.RedirectStreamGobbler
    RedirectStreamGobbler allows you to redirect the input stream to an outputstream, as well as supporting a stringbuffer.
    static class 
    StreamGobbler.StringBufferStreamGobbler
    This gobbler uses a StringBuffer, which is thread safe, but potentially slow.
    static class 
    StreamGobbler.StringBuilderStreamGobbler
    This is the simplest, fastest stream gobbler.

      public static StringBuilder convertInputStreamToStringBuilder(InputStream streamToRead)
      Reads a stream into a string builder and returns that builder
      Parameters:
      streamToRead - the stream to be converted to a string
      Returns:
      a string builder containing all the current contents of the stream

    • convertInputStreamToString

      public static String convertInputStreamToString(InputStream streamToRead)
      Converts a stream into a string, swallowing any error that might occur.
      Parameters:
      streamToRead - the stream to be converted
      Returns:
      a string containing the contents of the stream, or a partial, possibly empty string if an ioexception occurs
